cat.name: Category:Language

cat.name: Category:Technology
cat.indent: the root category of all kinds of (programming) technologies

cat.name: Category:Database management system
cat.indent: software to support creation, maintenance, and the use of databases

page.name: Technology:HSQLDB
page.intent: a relational database management system

page.name: Technology:SQL Server
page.intent: a relational model database server from Microsoft

page.name: Technology:Eclipse
page.intent: a popular IDE for Java with many available plugins

cat.name: Category:Language implementation
cat.indent: an implementation of a language with which programs of the language can be executed

page.name: Technology:AspectJ compiler
page.intent: the [[Language:AspectJ]] compiler as part of [[Technology:AJDT]]

page.name: Technology:GHC
page.intent: the Glasgow [[Language:Haskell]] Compiler

page.name: Technology:cs.exe
page.intent: The [[:Technology:CSharp|C#]] compiler as part of the [[:Technology:.NET|.NET]] Framework

page.name: Technology:javac
page.intent: the [[Language:Java]] compiler as part of [[Technology:JDK]]

page.name: Technology:GHCi
page.intent: a [[Language:Haskell]] interpreter

page.name: Technology:BaseX
page.intent: an XML database with [[Language:XPath]] and [[Language:XQuery]] processor

page.name: Technology:Saxon
page.intent: an implementation of [[Language:XSLT]] and [[Language:XQuery]]

page.name: Technology:Xalan-Java
page.intent: implementations of [[Language:XPath]] and [[Language:XSLT]] languages and [[Technology:JAXP]] interfaces

page.name: Technology:xsltproc
page.intent: a popular implementation of [[Language:XSLT]]

page.name: Technology:xjc
page.intent: the class generator of the [[Technology:JAXB]] technology for [[O/X mapping]] for the [[Technology:Java platform]]

page.name: Technology:Hibernate
page.intent: a [[:Category:O/R mapping technology|O/R mapping technology]] for [[Java]]

page.name: Technology:JAXB
page.intent: the [[Category:O/X mapping technology|O/X mapping technology]] as part of the [[Technology:JSE]] platform

page.name: Technology:Hibernate
page.intent: a [[:Category:O/R mapping technology|O/R mapping technology]] for [[Java]]

page.name: Technology:.NET
page.intent: a library and [[:Category:Runtime|runtime]] which supports several programming languages for Windows operating systems

page.name: Technology:Haskell platform
page.intent: a collection of tools of libraries for program development with Haskell

page.name: Technology:JSE
page.intent: the Java Standard Edition as a concrete instance of the Java platform

page.name: Technology:Java platform
page.intent: a collection of software and specifications for developing and deploying Java software

cat.name: Category:Reuseware
cat.indent: the most general concept of reusable entities in software development

page.name: Technology:DOM
page.intent: a platform- and language-neutral [[:Category:API|API]] for tree-based XML processing

page.name: Technology:SAX
page.intent: a simple API for [[push-based XML parsing]]

page.name: Technology:JAXP
page.intent: a collection of [[:Category:API|APIs]] ([[:Category:API implementation|implementations]]) for XML processing as part of the [[Technology:JSE]]

page.name: Technology:JDOM
page.intent: an [[:Category:API|API]] ([[:Category:API implementation|implementation]]) for tree-based XML processing

page.name: Technology:XOM
page.intent: an [[:Category:API|API]] ([[:Category:API implementation|implementation]]) for tree-based XML processing

page.name: Technology:Xalan-Java
page.intent: implementations of [[Language:XPath]] and [[Language:XSLT]] languages and [[Technology:JAXP]] interfaces

page.name: Technology:Kiama
page.intent: a [[Language:Scala]] [[:Category:library]] for language processing

page.name: Technology:Object Streams
page.intent: Classes of of the [[Technology:JSE]] for I/O for objects

cat.name: Category:Plugin
cat.indent: a collection of modules for the extension of a given software system

cat.name: Category:Toolkit
cat.indent: a collection of libraries, tools, plugins, or other reuseware.

page.name: Technology:AJDT
page.intent: [[Language:AspectJ]] Development Tools (AJDT)

page.name: Technology:BaseX
page.intent: an XML database with [[Language:XPath]] and [[Language:XQuery]] processor

page.name: Technology:Entity Framework
page.intent: an [[O/R mapping]] [[:Category:toolkit]] for the [[Technology:.NET]] Framework.

page.name: Technology:JDK
page.intent: the Java Development Kit

page.name: Technology:CLR
page.intent: A part of the [[Technology:.NET]] Framework which defines an execution environment for program code

page.name: Technology:JSE
page.intent: the Java Standard Edition as a concrete instance of the Java platform

cat.name: Category:Capability
cat.indent: a principle capability in programming to address non-functional requirements

page.name: Access control
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] to control access to data and resources within programs

page.name: Distribution
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] to distribute programs (objects) over computers in a network

page.name: Indexing
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] for access to keyed and ordered records

page.name: Interaction
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] of interactions between a system user and the system

page.name: Logging
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] of logging certain events along the execution of the program

page.name: O/R mapping
page.intent: the [[[capability]]] of bridging the technical spaces [[objectware]] and [[tupleware]]

page.name: O/X mapping
page.intent: the [[:Category:capability]] of bridging the technical spaces of [[objectware]] and [[XMLware]]

page.name: R/X mapping
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] of bridging the technical spaces [[tupleware]] and [[XMLware]]

page.name: Parallelism
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] to execute a program in parallel

page.name: Parsing
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] of analyzing software artifacts in terms of their concrete syntax

page.name: Persistence
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] to maintain program data beyond the runtime of the program

page.name: Serialization
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] of converting program data such as objects into a format suitable for storage or transmission

page.name: Streaming
page.intent: the [[:Category:Capability|capability]] for processing data in a stream as opposed to in-memory

page.name: Condition
page.intent: a [[:Category:Computation|computation]] that checks a condition on given data

page.name: Impure computation
page.intent: a computation that computes the result with side effects on data

page.name: Pure computation
page.intent: a computation that computes the result without side effects on data

page.name: Query
page.intent: a [[:Category:Computation|computation]] that performs a query on compound data

page.name: Endogenous transformation
page.intent: a transformation with the type of the input and output being the same

page.name: Exogenous transformation
page.intent: a transformation with the type of the input and output being ''not'' the same

page.name: Horizontal transformation
page.intent: a transformation that preserves the level of abstraction

page.name: Vertical transformation
page.intent: a transformation that lowers or raises the level of abstraction

cat.name: Category:Language concept
cat.indent: a concept for designing and using (software) [[:Category:language]]s

cat.name: Category:Advice
cat.indent: the concept of advising existing behaviors in [[aspect-oriented programming]]

cat.name: Category:Application
cat.indent: the concept of applying (invoking, etc.) a named abstraction

cat.name: Category:Class
cat.indent: the concept of declaring and invoking classes in [[OO programming]]

page.name: Abstract class
page.intent: a [[:Category:class]] that cannot be directly instantiated but subclasses may be amenable to instantiation

page.name: Concrete class
page.intent: a [[:Category:class]] that can be directly instantiated as opposed to an [[abstract class]]

cat.name: Category:Declaration
cat.indent: a [[:Category:language construct]] or [[:Category:language concept]] for declaring (named) abstractions in a program

page.name: Inter-type declaration
page.intent: retroactive declaration of contributions to a type declaration

cat.name: Category:Expression
cat.indent: the concept of composing computations of values

cat.name: Category:Field
cat.indent: the concept of declaring and using a named slot for data or objects in [[OO programming]]

cat.name: Category:Method
cat.indent: the concept of declaring and invoking behavior in [[OO programming]]

cat.name: Category:Instance method
cat.indent: [[:Category:Method]]s that are defined in the scope of specific objects (instances)

page.name: Getter
page.intent: read the state (a specific attribute) of an object

page.name: Setter
page.intent: write the state (a specific attribute) of an object

page.name: Virtual method
page.intent: [[:Category:Instance method]]s that may be overridden and dispatch is based on runtime receiver types

cat.name: Category:Static method
cat.indent: [[:Category:Method]]s that are not defined in the scope of specific objects (instances)

cat.name: Category:Statement
cat.indent: the concept of atomic or compound execution units in [[imperative programming]]

cat.name: Category:Language construct
cat.indent: a construct provided by (software) [[:Category:language]]s

cat.name: Category:Declaration
cat.indent: a [[:Category:language construct]] or [[:Category:language concept]] for declaring (named) abstractions in a program

page.name: Inter-type declaration
page.intent: retroactive declaration of contributions to a type declaration

page.name: Object model
page.intent: a collection of classes in [OO programming] for modeling structure and possibly behavior in a given domain

cat.name: Category:Programming
cat.indent: the act of writing programs and surrounding activities

page.name: Aspect-oriented programming
page.intent: programming in an [[:Category:aspect-oriented programming language]] in the [[aspect-oriented programming paradigm]]

page.name: Functional programming
page.intent: programming in a [[:Category:functional programming language]] in the [[functional programming paradigm]]

page.name: OO programming
page.intent: programming in a [[:Category:OO programming language]] in the [[OO programming paradigm]]

page.name: Aspect-oriented programming paradigm
page.intent: a programming paradigm that helps modularizing crosscutting concerns

page.name: Functional programming paradigm
page.intent: the functional [[:Category:Programming paradigm|programming paradigm]] centered around functions

page.name: OO programming paradigm
page.intent: the object-oriented programming paradigm centered around objects

page.name: Grammarware
page.intent: A technical space focused on string grammars

page.name: Modelware
page.intent: A technical space focused on models, metamodels, and model-driven engineering

page.name: Objectware
page.intent: A technical space focused on objects and [[OO programming paradigm|OO programming]].

page.name: Tupleware
page.intent: A technical space focused on relational databases

page.name: XMLware
page.intent: A technical space focused on XML documents and XML processing

cat.name: Category:Type
cat.indent: programmatic data model used for dynamic or static type checking

page.name: Algebraic datatype
page.intent: a form of [[:Category:type]] based on term-algebraic constructors

page.name: CLI
page.intent: a command line interface

page.name: GUI
page.intent: a graphical user interface

page.name: Push-based XML parsing
page.intent: Sequential XML processing such that the input is present as an event stream to a programmer-defined handler
